content: तानः [तन्-घञ्] {@--1@} A thread, fibre. {@--2@} (In music) A protracted tone, a key-note; यथा तानं विना रागः <ls>Bv. 1. 119</ls>; तानप्रदायित्वमिवोपगंतुं <ls>Ku. 1. 8.</ls> (the number of tānas is said to be 49). {@--3@} A monotonous tone. --नं {@--1@} Expanse, extension. {@--2@} An object of sense.
